GUI.panels

Class BattlePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.panels.BattlePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDungeonPanel, IUpdate

    public final class BattlePanel
extends Object
implements IUpdate
    The panel that handles all the battles between a player and another actor. Implements IUpdate. Update method should be called whenever turn or actors' healths are changed.
